trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started" /> and <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos de <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started" /> e de <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped" /> .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow runtime engine is running.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o mecanismo de tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho está em execução.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow runtime engine is running; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho está sendo executado. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntimeEventArgs.IsStarted%2A> will be `true` for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and false for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntimeEventArgs.IsStarted%2A> será `true` para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Started?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos e false para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.
